hints.content:
All of the hexagons show $\dfrac26$ shaded.  

However, for two fractions to be equivalent, they must refer to the same size whole.
Which answer choice shows $\dfrac26$ of the same size wholes shaded?

This pair of hexagons shows equivalent areas shaded:

[[☃ image 1]]

[[☃ image 2]]

options.alt: A medium-sized hexagon is divided into six equal parts with two parts shaded. !
A medium-sized hexagon is divided into six equal parts with two parts shaded. !

question.content:
**Which pair of hexagons have equivalent areas shaded?**


[[☃ radio 1]]
